page.title: 12N.S.AREA STREET NAMES
page.content: Many people who visit Newton Stewart notice that the main streets have names linked with royalty.This is because at about the middle of the nineteenth century a local minister renamed these streets giving them names connected with{royalty,}for example{Arthur Street,Queen Street}and {Windsor Road.}In the year of the Queen's Silver Jubilee two new streets were named{Elizabeth Crescent}and {Philip Avenue.}This shows that giving royal names to streets is still as popular as before. Many other local street names are connected with the Galloway family,a branch of the royal house of Stewart. This group includes{Stewart of Garlies {Road(Garlies being the eldest son of {the Earl of Galloway),Garlies Cresent, {Dashwood Square,Lady Galloway Court {and Countess Court.
